data.title: Rates and Benefits
data.text:
AVS Membership

Connect with AVS and the below listed Membership Benefits, Digital Resources, and Discounts to support and enhance your professional development for any stage you are in your career. AVS Membership is an Anniversary-Based Membership.

Access to the Publications Library

Enrollment in Four Technical Divisions and One Group

Access to Technical Library (Presentations on Demand, Videos, Books, Recommended Practices, and More)

Discount on Individual Subscription to AIP Journals

Enrollment in a Local Chapter

Enrollment in an Additional Chapter of One’s Choice

AVS Newsletters, Including Beneath the AVS Surface, the President’s Message and Science Policy & Funding News

Physics Today

Discount on Select AVS Meetings and Short Courses

Career Services

Member Directory Access

Society Mailings and E-mail Announcements

Awards and Recognition

Life Insurance Discount

Vote

Hold Office

Membership Card

Additional Benefits from the American Institute of Physics
